song_name: Father and Son - Metal Gear Solid 4
metrics_conclusion: Father and Son - Metal Gear Solid 4 has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Father and Son - Metal Gear Solid 4 is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
